contents.text: Thank you for calling Luma Health in San Francisco, where we provide no-fuss, HIPAA-compliant text messaging and secure chat.
If you need help with appointment reminders or scheduling, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a patient scheduling specialist.

navigationGoals: I want to schedule an appointment and set up text reminders for it.
Reschedule my upcoming VA clinic appointment and confirm text reminder settings.
Configure API-driven appointment reminder workflows with custom time intervals.
Could you help me book a doctor’s appointment and sign me up for text reminders?
I’d like to schedule an appointment and set up reminder notifications.

contents.text: If you're experiencing issues with secure messaging, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with a messaging support specialist.

navigationGoals: I can’t send or receive encrypted messages and need help fixing my secure chat.
Fix an issue sending secure messages to my VA physician through Luma Health.
Troubleshoot TLS handshake failure in secure messaging channel causing undelivered texts.
I’m having trouble accessing my secure messages—can you guide me through reading and sending them?
I’m having trouble accessing or sending secure messages.

contents.text: For provider and administrator support, press 2.
For onboarding and setup assistance, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a provider onboarding specialist.

navigationGoals: I need assistance configuring my new provider account during onboarding.
Get help setting up my veteran outreach clinic’s Luma Health account and add staff access.
Set up OAuth 2.0 authentication and webhook endpoints for new provider accounts.
I’m a new clinic administrator; please walk me through setting up my provider account and adding my staff.
I need assistance onboarding and configuring Luma Health for our practice.

contents.text: For technical support and troubleshooting, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with a technical support representative.

navigationGoals: I’m encountering system errors on the platform and need technical support.
Troubleshoot the integration error between Luma Health and our VA medical records system.
Debug 500 Internal Server Error on message delivery API in production environment.
My secure chat feature isn’t working on my device; can you help me troubleshoot the connection?
I’m experiencing errors with the platform and need technical troubleshooting.
